mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.templet_num AS "templetNum", a.templet_type AS "templetType", a.templet_ver AS "templetVer", a.push_channel AS "pushChannel", a.templet_state AS "templetState", a.templet_content AS "templetContent", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mes_templet_info( id, templet_num, templet_type, templet_ver, push_channel, templet_state, templet_content, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{templetNum}, #{templetType}, #{templetVer}, #{pushChannel}, #{templetState}, #{templetContent}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE mes_templet_info SET templet_num = #{templetNum}, templet_type = #{templetType}, templet_ver = #{templetVer}, push_channel = #{pushChannel}, templet_state = #{templetState}, templet_content = #{templetContent}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
